refnamediv.refpurpose: Displays the list of commands executed during the current MGED session.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Displays the list of commands executed during the current MGED session. The one exception is the hist_add command, which can add a command to the history list without executing it. If the -delays option is used, then the delays between commands will also be displayed.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the history command to display the command history list for the current MGED session.

example.title: Display the command history list for the current MGED session.

listitem.para: Displays the command history list for the current MGED session.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
